boat.construction_details: Multi-chine plywood, lapstrake, epoxy encapsulated timbers

for_sales.sales_text:
Engine: 4HP Long Shaft Merlin Petrol Outboard (in well) Ballast: c140kg bagged lead ballast Anchor: With plenty of chain and warp Rigging: All running rigging Bilge Pump: Whale: manual Floors: Wooden: anti-slip painted Lying: Helford

Reluctantly selling much loved Isabella, an excellent family gaffer with a deep roomy cockpit for 4 – 6 adults or a sizeable family with children. She is built to a high specification of marine plywood with mahogany gunwales and laid teak decks fore and aft. Lovingly restored over the past few years with professional finishing by Gweek Classic Boatyard, she now needs a new owner to take her back on the water.

She comes with traditional tan sails (foresail on bowsprit, main, mizzen and topsail) and some 140kg of bagged lead ballast for trimming. All spars are in good condition and would benefit from a coat of varnish. The outboard engine needs servicing.

She has a galvanised steel centre plate/drop keel with winch in good condition. With the plate up, she will take the ground safely.

Included is a road trailer with ball hitch, winch, spare wheel and jack.

boat.name: Isabella
